name: B.F. Sword
description: Gain Attack Damage.

name: Recurve Bow
description: Gain Attack Speed.

name: Needlessly Large Rod
description: Gain Spell Power.

name: Tear of the Goddess
description: Gain Mana.

name: Chain Vest
description: Gain Armor.

name: Negatron Cloak
description: Gain Magic Resist.

name: Giant's Belt
description: Gain Health.

name: Spatula
description: It must do something...

name: Sparring Gloves
description: Gain Critical Strike Chance and Dodge Chance.

name: Deathblade
description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

name: Giant Slayer
description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do bonus damage. If the target has more health, the bonus damage increases.

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for a percentage of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder.

name: Spear of Shojin
description: The holder's Basic Attacks restore additional Mana.

name: Guardian Angel
description: Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After a short delay, they return with restored Health and shed all negative effects.

name: Bloodthirster
description: Physical damage heals the holder for a percentage of the damage dealt.

name: Zeke's Herald
description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Skirmisher Emblem
description: The holder gains the Skirmisher trait.

name: Infinity Edge
description: Grants Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes bonus Critical Strike Damage.

name: Rapid Firecannon
description: Increases the holder's Attack Range and grants bonus Attack Speed (including components). The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description: Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.

name: Statikk Shiv
description: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist for several seconds.

name: Titan's Resolve
description: When the holder takes damage or inflicts a critical strike, they gain a stacking Attack Damage and Ability Power bonus.  This stacks up to a limit, at which point the holder gains Armor and Magic Resistance.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing a percentage of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
description: At the start of combat, the holder taunts nearby enemies. When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are only partially effective.

name: Legionnaire Emblem
description: The holder gains the Legionnaire trait.

name: Last Whisper
description: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced for several seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: Grants a percentage bonus Ability Power (including components).

name: Archangel's Staff
description: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain Ability Power equal to a percentage of their maximum Mana (this bonus applies to that Ability cast).

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
description: When combat begins, the holder and nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks damage for several seconds.

name: Ionic Spark
description: Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Mana.

name: Morellonomicon
description: When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing for the duration of the burn.

name: Spellweaver Emblem
description: The holder gains the Spellweaver trait.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains bonus Critical Strike Damage.

name: Blue Buff
description: After casting their Ability, the holder gains Mana.

name: Frozen Heart
description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies.

name: Chalice of Power
description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Spell Power for the rest of combat.

name: Redemption
description: Periodically, the holder radiates an aura to nearby allies, healing them a percentage of their missing Health. Affected allies take reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for several seconds.

name: Renewer Emblem
description: The holder gains the Renewer trait.

name: Hand Of Justice
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder's basic attacks and spells deal additional damage or heal for a percentage of damage dealt.

name: Bramble Vest
description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal magic damage to all nearby enemies every couple seconds.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
description: The holder gains Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

name: Sunfire Cape
description: Periodically, a random nearby enemy is burned a percentage of their maximum Health over several seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced.

name: Ironclad Emblem
description: The holder gains the Ironclad trait.

name: Shroud of Stillness
description: When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana until they cast.

name: Dragon's Claw
description: Grants bonus Magic Resist (including components).

name: Zephyr
description: When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

name: Redeemed Emblem
description: The holder gains the Redeemed trait.

name: Quicksilver
description: The holder is immune to crowd control for the first several seconds of combat.

name: Warmog's Armor
description: Grants bonus Health (including components).

name: Dawnbringer Emblem
description: The holder gains the Dawnbringer trait.

name: Trap Claw
description: Blocks the first enemy Ability that hits the holder, and stuns the Ability's caster for several seconds.

name: Force of Nature
description: The holder's maximum team size is incrased.

name: Assassin Emblem
description: The holder gains the Assassin trait.

name: Thief's Gloves
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level. [Consumes Three Item Slots. Cannot Grant Shadow Items]

name: Shadow Sword
description: Gain Attack Damage.

name: Shadow Bow
description: Gain Attack Speed.

name: Shadow Rod
description: Gain Spell Power.

name: Shadow Tear
description: Gain Mana.

name: Shadow Vest
description: Gain Armor.

name: Shadow Cloak
description: Gain Magic Resist.

name: Shadow Belt
description: Gain Health.

name: Shadow Spatula
description: It must do something evil...

name: Shadow Gloves
description: Gain Critical Strike Chance and Dodge Chance.

name: Caustic Deathblade
description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.
shadowPenalty: The holder starts with a percentage of their maximum Health.

name: Spectral Giantslayer
description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do bonus damage.
shadowPenalty: If the target is below a certain Health, the holder's Abilities and attacks do decreased damage.

name: Hextech Gunblade Of Immortality
description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heals the ally with the lowest percent Health for a percentage of the damage dealt.
shadowPenalty: This heal cannot affect the holder.

name: Spectral Spear of Shojin
description: The holder's attacks restore additional Mana.
shadowPenalty: The holder deals less damage.

name: Fallen Guardian Angel
description: Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After a short delay, they return with restored Health and shed all negative effects.
shadowPenalty: After this effect triggers, the holder's Attack Speed is reduced for the rest of combat.

name: Riskthirster
description: Physical damage heals the holder for a percentage of the damage dealt.
shadowBonus: Each time the holder heals to a percentage Health, they gain a percentage Attack Speed for several seconds.
shadowPenalty: The holder takes a percentage of their maximum Health in true damage at the beginning of combat or upon being equipped.

name: Zeke's Bleak Herald
description: When combat begins, the holder reduces the Attack Speed of all nearby allies within in the same row. The holder then gains Attack Speed for each affected ally.

name: Forgotten Emblem
description: The holder gains the Forgotten trait.

name: Sacrificial Infinity Edge
description: Grants Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes bonus Critical Strike Damage.
shadowBonus: The holder also gains bonus Critical Strike Damage.
shadowPenalty: Each time the holder critically strikes, they deal a percentage of their maximum Health to themselves as true damage.

name: Rapid Deathcannon
description: Increases the holder's Attack Range and grants bonus Attack Speed (including components) when there are no enemies nearby. The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

name: Guinsoo's Sacrificial Rageblade
description: Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.
shadowPenalty: The holder is dealt a percentage of their maximum Health as true damage each attack.

name: Statikk Stiletto
description: Every other attack from the holder unleashes chain lightning that strikes nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist for several seconds.
shadowPenalty: The holder has their Attack Damage reduced.

name: Titan's Revenge
description: Periodically, the holder's next attack deals a percentage of the total damage they have taken since the last empowered attack as true damage.

name: Runaan's Untamed Hurricane
description: The holder's attacks fire bolts at nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of the holder's Attack Damage. These bolts can critically strike but do not apply on-hit effects.

name: Unstable Zz'Rot Portal
description: At the start of combat, the holder taunts nearby enemies. When the holder dies, an Unstable Voidspawn arises and taunts enemies again. When it dies it deals true damage to nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are only partially effective.

name: Hellion Emblem
description: The holder gains the Hellion trait.

name: Final Whisper
description: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor and Magic Resist are reduced for several seconds.
shadowPenalty: The holder's Armor and Magic Resist are also permanently reduced.

name: Rabadon's Caustic Deathcap
description: Grants a percentage bonus Ability Power (including components).
shadowPenalty: The holder receives reduced maximum Health.

name: Archdemon's Staff Of Immortality
description: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain empty maximum Health equal to a percentage of their maximum Mana. The holder then heals for that amount.

name: Locket of the Silver Lunari
description: When combat begins, the holder and nearby allies in the same row gain bonus Armor and Magic Resist.
shadowPenalty: Affected allies gain less Mana per attack.

name: Ionic Dark-Spark
description: Nearby enemies and allies (except the holder) are zapped when they cast an ability, taking magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Mana.
shadowBonus: Whenever an ally or enemy is zapped, the holder gains Ability Power for the rest of combat.

name: Mor-evil-lonomicon
description: When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing for the duration of the burn.
shadowPenalty: The holder's Ability deals less damage.

name: Dragonslayer Emblem
description: The holder gains the Dragonslayer trait.

name: Sacrificial Gauntlet
description: The holder gains Critical Strike Damage, and magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike.
shadowBonus: The first time the holder casts their Ability each combat, they gain additional Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat (applies to that Ability cast).
shadowPenalty: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they take true damage equal to a percentage of their max Mana.

name: Very Dark Blue Buff
description: After casting their Ability, the holder gains Mana.
shadowBonus: If the holder has less than a percentage of their Health, the Mana gained is increased.

name: Frozen Dark Heart
description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies.
shadowPenalty: The Attack Speed of nearby allies (except the holder) is reduced.

name: Chalice of Malice
description: When combat begins, all of the holder's nearby allies in the same row gain Spell Power for the rest of combat.
shadowPenalty: The holder loses Ability Power instead of gaining any.

name: Sacrificial Redemption
description: Periodically, the holder radiates an aura to all allies on the board except themself, healing them a percentage of their missing Health.
shadowPenalty: Each time this happens, the holder damages themself a percentage of their current Health as true damage.

name: Coven Emblem
description: The holder gains the Coven trait.

name: Hand of Vengeance
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder's basic attacks and spells deal additional damage or heal for a percentage of damage dealt.
shadowPenalty: These bonuses expire after each takedown, and renew on the next.

name: Refracted Bramble Vest
description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal magic damage to all nearby enemies every couple seconds.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate Of Immortality
description: The holder heals themself periodically for each enemy targeting them.

name: Eclipse Cape
description: Periodically, a random nearby enemy is burned a percentage of their maximum Health over several seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced.
shadowPenalty: The holder is also burned for a percentage of their maximum Health every second for the entirety of combat, and any healing they receive is reduced.

name: Cavalier Emblem
description: The holder gains the Cavalier trait.

name: Dark Shroud of Stillness
description: When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead and behind that delays affected enemies' and other allies' first ability cast, increasing their maximum Mana until they cast.

name: Refracted Dragon's Claw
description: Reduces incoming magic damage by a percentage.
shadowBonus: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits.

name: Turbulent Zephyr
description: When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds. Ignores CC immunity.
shadowPenalty: Once the enemy returns to combat, they gain Attack Damage and Ability Power for the rest of combat.

name: Revenant Emblem
description: The holder gains the Revenant trait.

name: Caustic Quicksilver
description: The holder is immune to crowd control for the entirety of combat and receives reduced Health.

name: Warmog's Sacrificial Armor
description: Grants bonus Health (including components).
shadowPenalty: The holder takes true damage each second.

name: Nightbringer Emblem
description: The holder gains the Nightbringer trait.

name: Banshee's Claw
description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.

name: Force of Darkness
description: The holder's maximum team size is incrased.
shadowPenalty: The player's Little Legend takes increased percentage damage after losing a battle.

name: Abomination Emblem
description: The holder gains the Abomination trait.

name: Trickster's Gloves
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. These are always full shadow items. [Consumes Three Item Slots]
